data.title: MARZ: Redshifting Program
data.name: Marz
data.description: The Marz redshifting program is intended for use in cosmology surveys, specifically for the OzDES team.

evidence: "This project aims to take spectra from the AAOmega spectrograph and redshift them via an online application, for application in cosmology."

"Instructions for use can be found in the application itself, which you can access at http://samreay.github.io/Marz." and "Local servers can be start by downloading this project, and ... running `runServer.bat` or `runServer.sh`."
"After doing this, you can analyse a FITS file by running `./marz.sh <FITSFilePath>`, which will direct output to `stdout`."
